original_text:
You have renounced the covenant with your servant
    and have defiled his crown in the dust.
korean_text: 주의 종의 언약을 미워하사 그의 관을 땅에 던져 욕되게 하셨으며

sentences.original_text: You have renounced the covenant with your servant
and have defiled his crown in the dust
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 왕관을 먼지 속에서 더럽히셨습니다
